mapper.select: select * from product order by platform asc
select * from product where platform = #{platform} order by relase_date desc

select p.id_product, p.name, p.price, p.platform from product p, product_option opt, order_cart c, member m where c.id_product = p.id_product and c.id_option_product = opt.id_option_product and c.id_member = m.id_member and m.id_member = #{id_member} ORDER by c.reg_date asc

select p.name, p.price from product p left join product_img img on p.id_product = img.id_product left join product_evaluation e on p.id_product = e.id_product where img.kind = 'main' and p.platform = #{platform} group by p.name, p.price, p.relase_date, img.fname order by p.relase_date desc
